article_title: California Wildfire Forces Thousands From Homes
article_text:
California Gov. Jerry Brown declared a state of emergency Sunday in response to a raging wildfire in north-central California that has prompted thousands of residents to evacuate their homes and left four firefighters hospitalized.

The fire has destroyed hundreds of structures—including homes—fire officials said late Sunday. Those numbers could change, however, because emergency officials hadn’t yet been able to conduct a full...
